ygData.messageBody:
Pointer #1 for killing Borxx

Pointer #1: take a big stick with you..you are not going to cast on her very
well 'till 28

Pointer #2: Take some Strong Blades and a healer with you..it can get really
nasty really fast. I'd advise a Druid with an Evac Spell

Pointer #3: Perpare for a long camp...sometimes she spwns fast..sometimes
she takes forever!

~ Auraelle MacFadyen ~
~Priestess of Veeshan~
~ Follower of Tunare ~
~ Lords of Light ~

E'ci
----- Original Message -----
From: Joe Wallace <joew88@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 24, 1999 5:18 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards]


> From: "Joe Wallace" <joew88@...>
>
> >> Wizards can be a lot of fun. Oh, btw. Killed Borxx last night and
went
> and

> out,
> >> getting items on your own is so much more satisfying than buying them.
>
>
>
> Hello,
>
> I read your post on EQ_Wizards and I agree wholeheartily. My wizard just
> turned 27, and I would love to go get the Observer's Staff. Could you
give
> me some pointers on killing Borxx?
>
> Thanks much,
>
> JW
